value:
Is there a parent who would not
lament their child being sacrificed
to the flames of Loptous?

None can defy Julius's orders. But
the children he would see hunted
down...are innocent of any crime.

Why am I here? What am I meant to
accomplish here? Will the day come
when I know these answers?

It was Emperor Arvis himself who
said we must release the children
being held in the castle.

I envy pegasi and falcons... They
may simply fly away. Would that
I had wings.

The smiling faces that surround me
are harsh and glaring like the sun.

Why do I, as I am now, have
such power?
My strength must find its purpose.
Lord Julius, I...

Do not trouble yourself on my
account. Ah, no. It is only right
that I thank you.

I am Ishtar, a mage of the proud
house of Friege. Please, grant me
an opportunity to fight.

My love for Lord Julius is true. At
first, we were even happy. He was
kind, and I served his rule gladly.$k$pBut things changed. He instructed me
to abduct children, inflicting despair
upon the people. I could not do it.$k$pIf I have one request for you, it is this.
Value each general, each soldier.
Consider their lives as your own.$k$pHow many souls were sacrificed in
the endless war of my realm? We
knew no other way.$k$pI pray that the day comes when he
and I may atone for our sins. We
may then find peace, hope, and joy.
たあっ
これで
きゃああっ
At this rate...
You will go no further.
I will save them!
Not one more!
It is all right now.
If only I could do more...
Giggle
One of the children gave me this doll. Adorable, isn't it?
*startled* Oh, summoner. I thought I might be needed by a little one...
I disobeyed Lord Julius. He...does not yet know.
I have no regrets. They are safe now.
That was meant to be my time... My end.
Lord Julius... I do love you.
You have the potential to change the world. What a wonderful thing.
Very well.
Your orders.
It will be done.
